name: Safest Way
description:
INFORMATION

In this game you need to rotate tiles to make path from one door to another!

You can rotate path tiles by left-click on your mouse.

Beware of enemies who will attack you! Remember they walk your path just like the your hero.

Enemies of different factions are hostile to each other.

Good luck!

AUTHORS

f1van (f1van#2882) - Idea, Game design, Programming, UI/UX design
